bug.author: prem0912
bug.summary: kubeflow basic auth and iap installation Error 400: Invalid value for field 'resource.name': 'kf_name-storage'.
bug.description:
/kind bug Kubeflow installation with istio is working but failing with basic_auth and iap Unable to install kubeflow basic_auth and iap in gcp Steps followed from kubeflow.org and issue comment <denchmark-link:https://github.com/kubeflow/kubeflow/issues/4642#issuecomment-573156473>#4642 (comment)</denchmark-link>
[A clear and concise description of what the bug is.] root@ubuntu:/demo_dir/kf_name# export CONFIG_FILE=kfctl_gcp_basic_auth.0.7.1.yaml root@ubuntu:/demo_dir/kf_name# kfctl apply -V -f ${CONFIG_FILE} filename="coordinator/coordinator.go:120" INFO[0000] .cache/manifests exists; not resyncing filename="kfconfig/types.go:460" INFO[0000] folder gcp_config exists, skip gcp.Generate filename="gcp/gcp.go:2060" INFO[0000] folder kustomize exists, skip kustomize.Generate filename="kustomize/kustomize.go:304" INFO[0000] .cache/manifests exists; not resyncing filename="kfconfig/types.go:460" INFO[0000] Creating default token source filename="gcp/gcp.go:182" INFO[0000] Creating GCP client. filename="gcp/gcp.go:194" INFO[0000] Reading config file: /root/demo_dir/kf_name/gcp_config/storage-kubeflow.yaml filename="gcp/gcp.go:286" INFO[0000] Reading import file: /root/demo_dir/kf_name/gcp_config/storage.jinja filename="gcp/gcp.go:322" INFO[0001] Creating deployment kf_name-storage filename="gcp/gcp.go:460" Error: failed to apply: (kubeflow.error): Code 500 with message: coordinator Apply failed for gcp: (kubeflow.error): Code 500 with message: gcp apply could not update deployment manager Error could not update storage-kubeflow.yaml; Insert deployment error: googleapi: Error 400: Invalid value for field 'resource.name': 'kf_name-storage'. Must be a match of regex 'a-z?', invalid Usage: kfctl apply -f ${CONFIG} [flags] Flags: -f, --file string Static config file to use. Can be either a local path: export CONFIG=./kfctl_gcp_iap.yaml or a URL: export CONFIG=<denchmark-link:https://raw.githubusercontent.com/kubeflow/manifests/v0.7-branch/kfdef/kfctl_gcp_iap.0.7.0.yaml>https://raw.githubusercontent.com/kubeflow/manifests/v0.7-branch/kfdef/kfctl_gcp_iap.0.7.0.yaml</denchmark-link>
export CONFIG=<denchmark-link:https://raw.githubusercontent.com/kubeflow/manifests/v0.7-branch/kfdef/kfctl_existing_arrikto.0.7.0.yaml>https://raw.githubusercontent.com/kubeflow/manifests/v0.7-branch/kfdef/kfctl_existing_arrikto.0.7.0.yaml</denchmark-link>
export CONFIG=<denchmark-link:https://raw.githubusercontent.com/kubeflow/manifests/v0.7-branch/kfdef/kfctl_aws.0.7.0.yaml>https://raw.githubusercontent.com/kubeflow/manifests/v0.7-branch/kfdef/kfctl_aws.0.7.0.yaml</denchmark-link>
export CONFIG=<denchmark-link:https://raw.githubusercontent.com/kubeflow/manifests/v0.7-branch/kfdef/kfctl_k8s_istio.0.7.0.yaml>https://raw.githubusercontent.com/kubeflow/manifests/v0.7-branch/kfdef/kfctl_k8s_istio.0.7.0.yaml</denchmark-link>
kfctl apply -V --file=${CONFIG} -h, --help help for apply -V, --verbose verbose output default is false failed to apply: (kubeflow.error): Code 500 with message: coordinator Apply failed for gcp: (kubeflow.error): Code 500 with message: gcp apply could not update deployment manager Error could not update storage-kubeflow.yaml; Insert deployment error: googleapi: Error 400: Invalid value for field 'resource.name': 'kf_name-storage'. Must be a match of regex 'a-z?', invalid What did you expect to happen: Successful installation of kubeflow with basic auth or iap Anything else you would like to add: [Miscellaneous information that will assist in solving the issue.] Environment:
Kubeflow version: (version number can be found at the bottom left corner of the Kubeflow dashboard): kfctl version: (use kfctl version): v0.7.0 Kubernetes platform: (e.g. minikube) gcp Kubernetes version: (use kubectl version): 1.13

comments.comment: Issue-Label Bot is automatically applying the label kind/bug to this issue, with a confidence of 0.97. Please mark this comment with üëç or üëé to give our bot feedback! Links: <denchmark-link:https://github.com/marketplace/issue-label-bot>app homepage</denchmark-link> , <denchmark-link:https://mlbot.net/data/kubeflow/kubeflow>dashboard</denchmark-link> and <denchmark-link:https://github.com/hamelsmu/MLapp>code</denchmark-link> for this bot.
Resolved issue The KF_NAME Environment variable should not have Underscore("_"). This issue is resolved by removing the _ from the variable.
